# Procedure

> AI Engineering & Product Development Company

Procedure is an AI engineering company that builds production-ready AI products and systems. We specialize in LLM applications, AI agents, and secure AI infrastructure for startups, scale-ups, and enterprises.

## Services

### By Engagement Model
- **Forward-Deployed AI Teams**: Senior engineers embedded with your team, building AI-powered products
- **AI Sprints**: Rapid 3-5 day engagements to prototype, validate, or ship AI features
- **Full Product Build**: End-to-end AI product development from concept to production launch
- **Staff Augmentation**: Scale your AI and engineering team with senior talent on demand

### By Company Stage
- **Startups**: Ship your AI-powered MVP or launch-ready product with velocity
- **Scale-ups**: Scale your engineering team and AI capabilities as you grow
- **Enterprise**: Enterprise-grade AI solutions with security and compliance built in

## Expertise

### AI & Machine Learning
- **LLM Applications**: ChatGPT, Claude, and open-source LLM integrations. RAG, fine-tuning, and prompt engineering
- **AI Agents & Automation**: Autonomous agents, workflow automation, and AI-powered business processes
- **AI Privacy**: Prevent data leakage and ensure compliance

### Product Engineering
- **Frontend Development**: React, Next.js, Vue, and modern web applications
- **Backend Development**: Node.js, Python, Go, and cloud-native architectures
- **Mobile Development**: Native iOS, Android, and cross-platform React Native apps
- **QA & Test Engineering**: Automated testing, CI/CD integration, and quality assurance

### Cloud & DevOps
- **Cloud Architecture**: AWS, GCP, Azure. Scalable and cost-optimized infrastructure
- **Kubernetes**: Container orchestration and cloud-native deployments

### Design
- **Product Design**: Human-centered UX for AI-powered products
- **Design Systems**: Scalable component libraries and design tokens

## Industries

- **Financial Services**: AI for trading, risk analysis, fraud detection, and regulatory compliance
- **Healthcare**: HIPAA-compliant AI for diagnostics and clinical workflows
- **Education**: AI-powered learning platforms, content generation, and adaptive education
- **SaaS & Technology**: AI features and infrastructure for software companies

## Use Cases

- **AI-Powered Search**: Semantic search, recommendations, and intelligent discovery
- **Document Intelligence**: Extract, classify, and analyze documents at scale
- **Conversational AI**: Chatbots, voice assistants, and customer service automation

## Compliance

- SOC 2 Type II
- HIPAA compliant
- GDPR ready
- AI governance frameworks

## Programs

- **AI Upskill**: 12-week AI engineering bootcamp transforming developers into AI engineers
- **Rubber Duck**: 8-week intensive cohort for fresh graduates to become industry-ready engineers

## Key Pages

- /: Homepage
- /about: About Procedure - our team and mission
- /approach: How we work differently - forward-deployed, production-first
- /why-us: Why choose Procedure
- /culture: Our values and team culture
- /careers: Join our team
- /contact: Get in touch
- /blog: Engineering blog with technical deep-dives on AI, LLMs, and production systems
- /case-studies: Client success stories
- /ai-safety: Our commitment to responsible AI development
- /ai-upskill: AI engineering bootcamp program
- /rubber-duck: Graduate engineering program
- /events: Meetups, workshops, and conferences
